title: Check out YouTube’s trending topics, creators and music of 2024.

excerpt: YouTube released its annual End Of Year Trends report, which includes four lists across 12 different countries: Trending Topics, Top Creators, Top Songs and Top Songs on…
text: YouTube released its annual End Of Year Trends report, which includes four lists across 12 different countries: Trending Topics, Top Creators, Top Songs and Top Songs on Shorts.This year’s trending moments showcase how YouTube and pop culture intersect. The report delves into how creators are driving top cultural moments and turning individual passions into global phenomena.To see which topics, creators and songs made the list, check out the full report.
html:
YouTube released its annual End Of Year Trends report, which includes four lists across 12 different countries: Trending Topics, Top Creators, Top Songs and Top Songs on Shorts.

This year’s trending moments showcase how YouTube and pop culture intersect. The report delves into how creators are driving top cultural moments and turning individual passions into global phenomena.

To see which topics, creators and songs made the list, check out the full report.
